comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, addressing the Tanganyika Constitutional Conference, held in the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam from 27 to 29 March 1961.  On Mr Macleod's right hand is Mr W B L Monson, Under-Secretary of State at the Colonial Office, and on his right (ie on left in the picture) is Mr B E Rolfe, of the Colonial Office. On Mr Macleod's left is the conference Secretary-General, Mr A J Chant, of the Tanganyika Government.
